sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT VAL1,VAL3,VAL4,VAL7 from ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE c.LOV_TYPE= ''',variables('LOV_TYPE'),''' AND c.LOV_NAME = ''',variables('LOV_NAME'),''' AND c.ACTIVE_FLG =''Y''')

activities.name: If Configval is nul or Some Config val is Null

expression.value: @or(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config Value').output),'firstRow')),or(or(or(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1),null),equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3),null)),equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4),null)),equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7),null)))

ifTrueActivities.name: insert error when config val error

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_DATA_FACTORY
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',
	''',variables('DATA_TYPE'),''',
	''E'',''',
	if(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config Value').output),'firstRow')),concat('Config LOV_TYPE : ',variables('LOV_TYPE'),' ,LOV_NAME : ',variables('LOV_NAME'),' Data not found.'),concat('Config ',
	if(startswith(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	,','),substring(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	,1,sub(length(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	),1)),
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	)
	,' Data not found.')),''');')
